title: Jake Brancatella, the Muslim Metaphysician, on Trinitiarian and Unitarian views of Jesus
description:
Jake Brancatella is the host of The Muslim Metaphysician channel on youtube. Jake has an interesting story, he grew up catholic but later converted to Islam, partially over objections to the doctrine of the trinity. He has studied philosophy and knows a lot about different Christian doctrines of the trinity. We discuss his current Islamic views of Jesus and the other prophets, we discuss the different trinity models in Christianity and what we perceive as their shortcomings, and then we discuss Unitarian Christian views of Jesus. Specifically mentioned are Dr. Khalil Andani and Dr. Beau Branson, both previous guests on the channel. I hope you will enjoy!

Jake's youtube channel: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCcGQRfTPNyHlXMqckvz2uqQ

Jake's twitter: https://twitter.com/MMetaphysician
